body:
Next time Intune syncs it says application is uninstalled successfully. The only traces I found was in Event Viewer \ Applications and Services Logs \ Microsoft \ Windows \ AppxDeployment-Server Heres related events, oldest event first: * [Information] Started deployment Remove operation on a package with main parameter Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.0.103.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe and Options 0 and 0. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235160 for help diagnosing app deployment issues. * [Verbose] Creating Resiliency File C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows\AppRepository\8eb05c6e-8f85-4c9a-80db-8f4514459b74_S-1-12-1-391392237-1099207582--2443643826_1.rslc for Remove Operation on Package Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.0.103.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe. * [Information] Deployment Remove operation on package Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.0.103.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe has been de-queued and is running for user SID S-1-12-1-391392237-1099207582- * [Information] Finished resolving action lists. DeploymentRequest action lists: removePackageList: Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.0.103.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe. * [Verbose] About to service package Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.0.103.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe. Setting the package state to disabled returned with 0x0. * [Verbose] 0x0: AllowUninstall successful for package Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.0.103.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe. * [Error] AppExecutionAlias directory missing, error code is 0x8007010B. * [Verbose] Finished servicing package Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.0.103.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe. Setting the package state to enabled returned with 0x80070490. * [Information] Deployment Remove operation on Package Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.0.103.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe: PostDeploymentOperationCheck cost: 0 ms * [Information] Deployment Remove operation on Package Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.0.103.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe: PostDeploymentOperationCheck cost: 0 ms * [Information] Deployment Remove operation on Package Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.0.103.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe: State repository CommitTransaction cost: 78 ms
Troubleshooting packaging, deployment, and query of Windows apps - Win32 apps
Use these suggestions to troubleshoot problems you experience when packaging, deploying, or querying an app package.
